original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 319.75/320.50 to the US dollar, bond yields up
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee is at 319.75/320.50 to the US dollar on Tuesday, dealers said.
The rupee closed at 319.00/320.00 to the US dollar on Wednesday.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted up at 12.50/60 percent after closing on Wednesday at 11.50/12.00 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2028 was quoted up at 12.50/80 percent after closing at 11.95/12.50 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted up at 12.80/95 percent after closing at 12.40/75 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted up at 12.75/13.25 percent from closing at 12.40/75 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted down 13.00/50 percent after closing at 12.75/13.75 percent. (Colombo/Aug09/2023)
